c.code: #include <stdbool.h> #include <stdio.h> #include "Graph.h" #define MAX_NODES 1000 int visited[MAX_NODES]; // array to store visiting order // indexed by vertex 0..nV-1 bool dfsPathCheck(Graph g, int nV, Vertex v, Vertex dest) { Vertex w; for (w = 0; w < nV; w++) if (adjacent(g, v, w) && visited[w] == -1) { visited[w] = v; if (w == dest) return true; else if (dfsPathCheck(g, nV, w, dest)) return true; } return false; } bool findPathDFS(Graph g, int nV, Vertex src, Vertex dest) { Vertex v; for (v = 0; v < nV; v++) visited[v] = -1; visited[src] = src; return dfsPathCheck(g, nV, src, dest); } int main(void) { int V = 6; Graph g = newGraph(V); Edge e; e.v = 0; e.w = 1; insertEdge(g, e); e.v = 0; e.w = 4; insertEdge(g, e); e.v = 0; e.w = 5; insertEdge(g, e); e.v = 5; e.w = 4; insertEdge(g, e); e.v = 4; e.w = 2; insertEdge(g, e); e.v = 4; e.w = 3; insertEdge(g, e); e.v = 5; e.w = 3; insertEdge(g, e); e.v = 1; e.w = 2; insertEdge(g, e); e.v = 3; e.w = 2; insertEdge(g, e); int src = 0, dest = 5; if (findPathDFS(g, V, src, dest)) { Vertex v = dest; while (v != src) { printf("%d - ", v); v = visited[v]; } printf("%d\n", src); } return 0; } // By // .----------------. .----------------. .----------------. // .-----------------. .----------------. .----------------. // | .--------------. || .--------------. || .--------------. || // .--------------. | | .--------------. || .--------------. | | | _________ | // || | _____ _____ | || | __ | || | ____ _____ | | | | ____ ____ // | || | ____ | | | | | _ _ | | || ||_ _||_ _|| || | / \ // | || ||_ \|_ _| | | | | |_ || _| | || | .' `. | | | | |_/ | | // \_| | || | | | | | | || | / /\ \ | || | | \ | | | | | | | // |__| | | || | / .--. \ | | | | | | | || | | ' ' | | || | // / ____ \ | || | | |\ \| | | | | | | __ | | || | | | | | | | // | | _| |_ | || | \ `--' / | || | _/ / \ \_ | || | _| |_\ |_ // | | | | _| | | |_ | || | \ `--' / | | | | |_____| | || | `.__.' // | || ||____| |____|| || ||_____|\____| | | | | |____||____| | || | `.____.' // | | | | | || | | || | | || | | | | | // | || | | | | '--------------' || '--------------' || // '--------------' || '--------------' | | '--------------' || '--------------' // | // '----------------' '----------------' '----------------' // '----------------' '----------------' '----------------' // Email : z5261243@unsw.edu.au // hhoanhtuann@gmail.com
